version_description:
New Pet function is online!
1.New gameplay Pet Race is online
A lovely pet not only can decorate your life, but also comfort your mind. 
The race is carried out in teams of 3v3 confrontation. You can get ranking points after finishing the race, which can be used in exchanging rewards in the pet house.

2.New exchange is available in Pet House
-- New fashion is updated.
--New artist [Qian Yi] is available in the exchange.
Tips: the new artist Qian Yi can only be obtained in the Pet House.

3.Function adjustment
The condition of the impeachment for the president of the association is adjusted to class 1, and only vice-president and council members can initiate the impeachment. The qualification of impeachment of elite members is cancelled.

4.Problem repair
Fix the problem that the active progress bar display incorrectly after pressing the fast claim button.
